website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a variety of vibrant colors, a solid design that will hold up against the elements, and simple-to-use controls, this adjustable patio umbrella should definitely be on your radar.
cons: As colorful and chic as these are, they do not include an anchoring base

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This Umbrella Is Perfect! It’s Large, Reasonably Priced, And Is Very Well Made!
customer_reviews.author: Erynn Brown-McCall

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. It has held up through the first part of Houston hurricane season and lots of rain. I was worried about mildew when it was folded and wet but it was not an issue. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought it to cover my toddler in the little pool we have in the back yard and it works great for my use. I love that I can put it back in the plastic bag it came with and store it in my shed for the colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love it... the size, price, color-pattern... installed in minutes. I did add the AGIO table ring to hold it steadier when I use the tilt, or wind the umbrella up or down. Looks wonderful with my bright red chairs... I'm very pleased. I'm saving the plastic bag to store it over the coming winter.
customer_reviews.author: adrianne hurtig

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrella at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality umbrella. I saw some just like this at a store that cost $20 more. Two piece post, quality fabric, and the crank handle is easy to operate. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: M.Price

customer_reviews.title: Weak Supports
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product with high hopes only to be disappointed by the product and company. We had it for only half the summer. One of the umbrella poles broke and another bent with less than four uses. I wouldn’t be as upset if someone had responded to my many emails.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: So far so good on this umbrella. We had to order this one because the wind took down the one we had. So far no problems and I love the bright color red! Easy to put the umbrella up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Steinsdoerfer

customer_reviews.title: Great patio umbrella at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and super easy to install (video shows how long it takes to put together, less than two minutes from box to use). I was able to use it without a base on my patio table which has a hole in the middle and a support below. It seemed just as sturdy as when I tried it with a base but it may be necessary depending on the table. I got this item at a discount but all the same it looks just as good as any of the other similarly priced umbrellas and I can definitely recommend this seller as someone that responds quickly to questions.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chouinard

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - might as well make a diy umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella arrived as what looked like a returned item. There was nothing seriously damaged, just a few scratches here and there - evidence that the previous buyer opened the box, installed, had a few chuckles about how toy-like this umbrella is, threw it back in the box and returned it. I wouldn't even give this product a chance as I KNOW it will fail even if there is a light breeze - it is that cheap! Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Dent

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this product AT ALL! After less than a month of use, something has broken inside the pole and the umbrella will only stay tilted. I paid too much for this and now I'll have to buy another to replace this. I never had it tilted as the gizmo to do it was too hard to operate for my fingers. but something broke inside the pole while closing the umbrella. It also lacks a sash to tie it when it's folded. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Stich

customer_reviews.title: This is one great patio umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is one great patio umbrella. The structure is built very strong so when the wind blew it doesn’t fly. It is very sturdy. I love the color it matches to my table and chair very easily. It is also retractable so it is very easy to close ad open. It is also big enough for my long table.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the price, but.....
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was great, but I left it up for a couple days and the mechanism that keeps it from tilting when you don't want it to tilt completely fell apart in my hands....like button fell off, spring flew out and I heard some piece go down into the umbrella itself. Otherwise it does the job. I will probably have to duct tape it now to keep it upright, though. I've only had it a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Major color change
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two umbrellas not that long ago. Within the first couple of weeks, one started to change color. The black has evolved into a brownish burgandy. As you can see from the tie, it used to be as black as the one next to it. Not very happy, they look ridiculous side by side. I’d like to get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Sommerhalter

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella fell and broke in half the first time we had any type of wind.
customer_reviews.text: As of July 19, 2019, I have not heard back from Amazon or from the store itself. The umbrella fell and broke in half the first time we had any type of wind. I even had a 40 lb stand and it still fell. The skelletin of the umbrella is very weak. I am hoping the mfr is willing to ship me the top part of the pole so I can replace it. If I can't get the pole, my only option is to throw the whole umbrella away. It shows well and does cover the sun when it's not too windy.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Acosta Jr

customer_reviews.title: Faded Quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella looks nice but the color faded to a purplish color in less than one month. I have purchased other umbrellas in which the color lasted the whole summer season in the sun, even dark blue! The material is not very thick, perhaps that is why the color faded so much, but if you buy a dark color, beware. I bought dark blue. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Broke with less than 10 days of use
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was set up for less than 10 days before it broke at the mechanism. It was on the tilt setting and a wind came up which caused it to snap. It’s completely useless now. I want to mention that this umbrella was stabilized by a wrought iron weight and the wind that caused it to break wasn’t a strong wind at all, really more of a breeze. At first it seemed great, especially with all the other positive reviews, but mine proved to be very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Megs Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but needs tie back strap!
customer_reviews.text: These look very nice. I bought 2 of these 3-4 weeks apart, while the second was in transit the 1st was broken by minimum wind gust. The problem is that the crank up mechanism does not lock the umbrella closed and there is no tie strap to keep it closed either. So in my case while in the closed position a small wind gust opened the umbrella, another gust took the open umbrella and bent the pole also separated the top pole at the tilt mechanism. This is now garbage from a small thunderstorm, only had it for 3 weeks, have bought a bungee to secure the one that remains. I have had others that had no problem like this.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella but crank broke today
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for less than a month and always struggled with the crank. Had to force it to close the umbrella today and it broke. It did a great job of shading our patio but is now unusable and too bulky to return. Would the manufacturer consider sending a replacement part?
customer_reviews.author: explorer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella-great price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in tan and it's a nice Khaki tan, it's a good size and very well made. Only thing is it's a little top heavy even in a water filled base so I filled the bottom tube with fish tank gravel to give it some weight should a strong breeze take me by surprise again. I only put it out when I need to otherwise I take the top part out and store it indoors. It got caught in a sudden rain and the water just beaded off! I recommend and would buy again if I should need another; very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this (the black and white one) for well over a year now and it's still going strong! It's sturdy, opens and closes with ease, has good tilt adjustments, and was a great price! It still looks great! We live in western Colorado (the high desert) at 4500 feet in elevation, this umbrella gets blasted with full sun on our south facing, uncovered deck, and it hasn't faded in color yet. We had a super expensive one that didn't hold up nearly as well before buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: RachelA

customer_reviews.title: I definitely do not recommend this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum pole split at the seam the first time I used it. Now I have to box it up and send it back to get my refund. Unfortunately, I did not save the box. So we have to find a box or boxes to send it back. I definitely do not recommend this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bilyeu

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Crank
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella was exactly the right color and size, but the crank handle broke before the summer was over, only three months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don P

customer_reviews.title: Nice looks BUT... cheap quality. Uggh.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very very nice however it will not last you very long I've had it a couple of months and already I'm seeing tears in the stitching and on the ends of the braces. I also am really annoyed by the creaking sounds of the Mast because it's not very well put together it wobbles a lot in the very top of the umbrella where the Tilt mechanism is and it doesn't really feel very stable it's a cheaply-made product that's okay for the money but there are much better products out there. I would spend a little more money in the future to get something that's better made.
customer_reviews.author: Nicodemus Black

customer_reviews.title: Color bleaching if it rains. Faulty crank handle.
customer_reviews.text: The color i ordered was the dark green and it was exactly as pictured, until it rained. We put the umbrella up on the next sunny day to find lines through the fabric where the color had bleached from the rain. Disappointing. Also, the crank to extend the umbrella does not hold its position. During any wind, the umbrella slowly closes up on its self. We ordered TWO of these at the same time and BOTH HAVE THE SAME PROBLEMS.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good Metal Parts But Bad Fabric - There Is A Solution
customer_reviews.text: I got these umbrellas (red and blue) hoping they would last a swimming season, but, they are not UV resistant at all. Las Vegas sun fades their colors badly within a week! But the metal parts are as good as they are with many other highly priced items. I kept the metal part and changed the canopy to one of EliteShade which has promotions on the end of summer season. You can get high quality canopies on Amazon from that seller under $10. Now, I have a very good umbrella after combining a good canopy with the metal parts of this seller, and still have saved a lot of money by doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Paperthin pole and very heavy umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I am totally disappointed with the pole. It's extremely thin. The umbrella itself it's heavy and supposed to whithold high beach winds. Well it's not holding up a mere 11mpr winds. it's not all the umbrella's issues with the thin poles, it's also the one knob stand.
customer_reviews.author: eileenvedado

customer_reviews.title: Fades Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella is very easy to assemble and lightweight. I got 2 in Navy.Looked great the first week we put it up. By the 3rd week in the Florida sun it had already begun to fade dramatically!! We usually close it and only open it when we are going to use them because of the unpredictable Miami weather. When I opened the umbrella at 3 weeks, this is what it looked like. Hoping it lasts...
customer_reviews.author: Aida D.

customer_reviews.title: Both poles bent. Cannot assemble
customer_reviews.text: The main pole already attached to the umbrella is bent above the handle. It is also bent below the handle which makes it impossible to insert the bottom section. In addition to that, the second pole is also bent. My husband is so angry. I just ordered another one because the heat on front deck is unbearable and am hoping the seller doesn't give us any grief about getting a refund for the first one. We can only think the damage was done before the item was packaged for shipping because the poles have such deep bends, the metal is cracked. Had the damage happened after packaging, the umbrella fabric would also have been ripped. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Gay Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The fabric is a little thin. When I set it up, I could see little specks of sky through the material, but considering the price and that it came with the pole as well, I’m not bothered. The umbrella detaches in the middle and has a thicker plastic bag to keep it all together, which is going to make storing it during the Oregon rainy season so much easier! It also has a tie attached to the fabric to keep it secure when down. The tilt action is pretty awesome too. We’ll see if this holds up for the summer. It was delivered June 29th. Will update if/when it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Dooby Doo

customer_reviews.title: Weak pole
customer_reviews.text: The pole broke with the first storm that came through the window broke it in half. The umbrella it’s self is very pretty I was pleased with it but the poll is too weak to withstand wind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Affordable Buy
customer_reviews.text: Just received this umbrella and I was impressed with it out the box. It feels fairly sturdy for being in the forty to fifty dollar price range which is a deal, IMO, for this type of item. It is currently being used in my pool which has a placement for it. So far, it has held up well in the NV heat and didn't break when the wind picked it up & thrashed it into the pool. Pure luck, I'm sure. As mentioned, it's affordable and looks like it will at least last through one season in the elements. Definitely a good score if it lasts any longer!
customer_reviews.author: KrissyVibes

customer_reviews.title: Fabric color changed within a month
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this about a month or so ago. I ordered in green as you can see from my order and it arrived, green. But, after a little over a month the umbrella fabric on the outer side facing the sun, has turned entirely blue. It is actually quite a dramatic change too as you can see from the pictures. The tie band is the color it arrived in. Luckily for us, our patio furniture is neutral enough, but that isn't the point. A sun protective umbrella should be colorfast from the sun, at least for a season! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Baker

customer_reviews.title: Spokes broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: The spokes on this umbrella bent and broke. We were careful to make sure to shut the umbrella every night and we didn't experience any high winds or anything like that (we had an umbrella pole snap once a few years ago, so we are careful about that). Spokes just sorta bent at the connecting points and then began snapping off. We got to use the umbrella maybe ten times before the first spoke snapped off. We contacted the seller hoping for a response but have heard nothing. Do not buy this umbrella unless you are planning to use it inside, once, very carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Price and durability
customer_reviews.text: Very nice umbrella. I reordered two more. It was half the price as ones from the local big name store. It’s new so not sure how long it’ll last; the ones from the local store only lasted 1 year but that was our fault. We left them out in heavy winds. Hopefully we learned to bring them in the garage, when needed. Our 3rd umbrella arrived today. Had to work on the crank because it was impossible to turn. After a bit of using every tool in the book my husband got it working if you hold it just so. Overall I’m glad we bought them
customer_reviews.author: Chris Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Very Weak Metal Poles - Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought two umbrellas. After three and a half weeks one of them completely snapped in half while it was in a proper umbrella stand. The weather was calm; sunny with a very very light breeze. The other umbrella is in perfect condition. Of course this happens the day the return window ends. However I am giving two stars because I was an informed buyer and knew the risk. After reading other reviews I knew I was taking a chance , but purchased due to low cost. I thought I would help my odds by removing umbrellas from stands and only put them up in stands when I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: vk

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I used this 9 ft red umbrella in my patio courtyard. Bought it in June 2018 and by Sept. 2018 (a few months later) it was very faded, as if it were several years old. Red turned to faded pink! Very disappointed. Also the market flaps on top of the umbrella are TOO SHORT. When it rains the flaps get weighted down, and rain comes through around the top of umbrella where they overlap the umbrella. Neighbors have a red umbrella in their patio courtyard, and it has not faded since we moved here a year ago and no flap issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella - very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: As a general rule, we try to shut the patio umbrella whenever a storm's threatening but we've been surprised a couple times this season & haven't been home when big rains have popped up. It's a testimony to how sturdy this umbrella is that it still looks brand new & works perfectly! The color hasn't faded, the mechanisms are smooth & it's held up surprisingly well to some nasty weather so I'd say, all in all, it's been a Very positive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Carollo

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking & sturdy but... Arrived damaged (top screw was bent which made a quarter sized hole -when open you could see through the hole & the topper would not screw on). I'm assuming this was a Amazon packaging issue as it was crammed sideways in a very lg box with no padding. Because of the current situation with the virus returning this huge item wasn't terribly convenient- thankfully we were able to fix it. Under normal circumstances I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Absolute CRAP 👎
customer_reviews.text: ***update these umbrellas are absolute crap! Both of them broke in less than two weeks. One wasn’t even opened when it fell over during some light wind and completely broke it into pieces. The other one, one of the rods which holds up the canopy bent and is on the verge of breaking off completely. I’ve returned them both and was only refunded for one! I’m furious at the customer service. I would never recommend this product!!! Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. I bought two and neither lasted more than 3 uses! With the first umbrella the rope/cord came off the track and is lodged (second use) so the umbrella is stuck about three quarters of the way open since it no longer goes up or down. Because the 9’ umbrella is partially open I Can’t ship it back without cutting the rope which then looks like i damaged it. The second umbrella lasted three uses then the button (plastic) to tilt came completely out. When I was trying to see if i could fix it one of the extension bars broke. Very poor quality, do not recommend. I’m out $100.00 and didn’t even get one season out of these umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Army Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Already looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't plan on leaving outside in the sun, the color starting fading after 2 weeks and we will have to replace it now (not with another one of these) at 3 months because it looks terrible. The color faded in stripes since we had it lowered when not in use to protect it from fading in the sun, since it's not feasible to bring it indoors every day. It's an outdoor patio umbrella, the colors should hold up outdoors!! We got the dark blue, so now we have an ugly faded blue with even uglier white faded stripes on it. Disappointing for the price, I do not recommend unless you buy the white.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: The pole rusts and the paint or whatever the coating is on the pole rubs off all over everything! It’s messy. It got all over my patio table, it rubs off on my hands.... and it’s not even kept where it can get wet. It’s poor quality. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a sturdy umbrella and is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: I will start off by saying I like the look of the umbrella but even though it is made of aluminum, it is not very strong as one of the ribs has already broken after a month of use. I purchased this as a replacement of an older, faded umbrella that had wood ribs that I have had for 8 years which I passed on to my neighbor. I had a new deck built last year so I wanted a good looking umbrella but it was certainly a mistake purchasing this. It's going in the trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Charnley

customer_reviews.title: first arrives with defect, replacement looks good.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good and very decent for the price. However, the first arrival has a hole somewhere (defect) when fully opened. we asked for return and received a new replacement. Now we are happy with the new one. We place it near the french window to the yard, serving a cover to prevent room overheat in summer seasons. 5 stars to the product, 4 stars to the overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lifan

customer_reviews.title: Faded immediately
customer_reviews.text: I received this item April 24. It’s May 12 and it has already faded significantly. So disappointed that an outdoor product can’t even handle the sun for 3 weeks. It’s so huge I won’t be able to return it without monumental hassle so I’m stuck with this ugly thing. Buy something else if you want it to last. I have my doubts the fabric will even last one season if it’s already this bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mama L

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for light use maybe but cannot withstand winds more than 10mph. It is cheaply made, wobbles and doesn’t stay locked into place. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jeepdandy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to arrive, but that may be due to Covid stuff. Right out of the package, it is torn/ improperly assembled. It ried to put the top on it as it shows in the instructions (that say please read, but it's all pictures). I thought maybe the finial on top would cover the issue, but there isn't enough sticking up for it to screw on. I am very frustrated. It's a shame because this looks like it would have been really pretty....
customer_reviews.author: KateSimm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Really good umbrella especially for the price . It is heavy enough to not blow away when closed. Has some loose strings but it doesn’t bother me especially since it was so much cheaper than similar umbrellas. Good coverage pretty color. Nice & bright. It does get a little tough to wind up once you get closer to it being fully opened but no big deal. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: NYamazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Crap Quality
customer_reviews.text: Would never buy this umbrella, sent back, poor stitching, was already coming apart at the seems along the top when it arrived. Save the heart ache and spend a few bucks more, or just use your underwear to patch your old umbrella first. This one is just more landfill 6 month junk from China!
customer_reviews.author: Bang Bang

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella for the price except...
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella for the price except the thread/stitches securing the small pockets for the ribs to the fabric made tiny hole on the fabric and I am not sure when those tiny holes are going to get bigger and break the fabric apart around that area. See the picture attached. I am keeping the old umbrella cover in case this new one falls apart due to that flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Totoro

customer_reviews.title: In 5 months, this umbrella faded from a beautiful hunter green to a turquoise blue.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella receives strong sunlight on a south and west facing deck, but morning sun and late afternoon sun is blocked by a building or a woods. Ordered in April, was easy to put together and easy to crank up and down. I'm unhappy that it faded so quickly and didn't even make it through a summer. My last one lasted years and only faded to a duller green. This one is now a totally different color on the outside than the inside (which is still hunter green) Not a satisfactory product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fading after less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought the navy blue color and received it on June 20th. It hasn’t been 2 months yet and it’s already starting the fade from the sun. We live in N.IL and our summers are mild. It was a relatively inexpensive patio umbrella. The fabric is not as nice as the other more expensive umbrellas we have. You get what you pay for with this item.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Survived Florida storms
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a year with the Cobana patio water umbrella base. Weathered really well no sun stains on the grey color. Survived Florida storms. We keep it open all year long unless there is a hurricane. Easy to move around with the base. Ordering an extra one for more shade by the pool. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this umbrella. I bought the red. It provides good coverage from the sun. I've had it up since May, it still looks as good as the day I put it up, no fading or tears (in full sun). It doesn't come with a strap, so I just use a small bungee cord to secure it when not in use. Side note: It even took a ride in the wind! I didn't have it secured tight enough in the umbrella weight. It got picked up about 20-25 feet and crashed onto the deck floor. Not a scratch on it! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: If you want the look of a $500 dollar for a lot less this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen umbrellas that look just like this one for $500. Not willing to spend $500 on an outdoor umbrella I was more than happy to come across this cute little striped number. It looks amazing and was super easy to put together. So far it has held up to the coastal sunshine and winds. Could not be more happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EllaBee

customer_reviews.title: Color faded!
customer_reviews.text: Good patio umbrella, but the top faded to a blue color in just a few weeks. The underside is the original color of green. Not a huge deal overall. Umbrella opens and closes easily. We put it in a heavy base to keep it from tipping over in wind.
customer_reviews.author: JorangeG

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this umbrella. I thought for under $50, it probably won’t be very strong. It’s amazing! So strong, with a nice thick material.
customer_reviews.author: Caron Forsberg

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella for the pool
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our pool and it’s held up great! We live in Florida and have lots of storms and this umbrella looks just as great today then it did the first day we put it up. It hasn’t rusted at all and the cloth is holding up perfectly. Definitely the best price I could find on a pool umbrella! We got the 9ft which is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Howes

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color,I did not like how late in the day i had to wait for UPS to deliver it! Ok looks great,Sturdy pole OH it has straps on it to close it and easy to open thats unless you tie it in a fishing tie then its on you! No really i looked at all the reviews seemed to me some people had issues with it just to get another one for free! So I dont know I am very satisfied withthe product I received. Happy Buying!
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Fades very quickly! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 BLUE umbrellas in May 2020, it is now August 2020. And as you can see the "blue" umbrellas I purchased in May are now completely FADED! And I can't even return them because my 30 days have expired. Tried to contact the manufacturer via email and no response. Unbelievable! So frustrated! Amazon really couldn't help because of the 30 day policy. To fade so quickly, honestly in a matter of 2 months is just so disappointing. And I can't even return them there goes $100 +!
customer_reviews.author: Jess B

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I was super worried about 'you get what you pay for' with this purchase. But I was very pleasantly surprised!! Great umbrella for our patio. We have an 8x10 patio and it shades a majority of it. I love the tilting option, great for the mid day sun that blares on us. I've found comparable umbrellas for a much higher price, super happy I took a chance on this one. Material and pole are very sturdy and not cheap looking in the least.
customer_reviews.author: katiemay

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far, color doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this umbrella. It was simple to assemble and goes up and down without a problem whatsoever. The biggest issue is that after only a month or so of use the color has completely washed out from the top of the umbrella. Figured maybe it would take a few years for that to happen but it happened rather quickly. Doesn't affect functionality as far as I can tell but we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent umbrella. Very sturdy, made well and very easy to use. Provides great coverage. Love the color! We have been so satisfied with this umbrella, we winded up ordering a second umbrella for a different part of our backyard. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: FW

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Quick, easy assembly. We like the colors. A word of advice, for this style umbrella. A surprise gust of wind pulled the entire assembly out of the hole in our table, sending it across the yard. I installed a large hose clamp, onto the post, below the table top, preventing any upward movement.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UMBRELLA! Fantastic quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: GREAT UMBRELLA! Fantastic quality for the price. Exactly what I was hoping for. Looks perfect all the way open, partially open or even when closed.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: I like this umbrella a lot and for the price it was a good buy. I’m giving it 4 stars as it came with a small stain on it that didn’t seem worth sending it back for. Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great patio addition
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is a joy to have. Easy to assemble and nice quality item. So worth it! Easy up and down with the crank handle. Big plus! It tilts if you should need to adjust for the sun, but we normally just leave it in the upright position. We purchased the red and it is a lovely deep red color. So far, no fading or discoloring and it has been a crazy wet then brutally hot, sunny summer.
customer_reviews.author: MomsTara

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is well made, It has stood up to storms on the ocean and being uplifted and blown across my lawn. Landed in perfect condition. The color has not faded. Because it was not expensive I was hestitant to buy it Happy I did. It was the best purchase ever I have paid hundreds of dollars and not had good luck in the wind..I bought 2 and both are like the day they arrived! I am one happy customer. Replacing umbrellas can be very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: rainphillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick material
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many over the years. Our old ones needed replacing so ordered one. So bright with color, and the material is much thicker than most. My wife loved it so much I have another ordered for delivery this Saturday. So will have two. Great value ans size. Would recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Rick Biggs

customer_reviews.title: ... had to send it back but it was sooo pretty my patio was going to be da
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective had to send it back but it was sooo pretty my patio was going to be da bomb
customer_reviews.author: kena walls

customer_reviews.title: Broken First Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these patio umbrellas for a family reunion party in mid July. Weather was perfect. One of the umbrellas however, was terrible. Upon the first use, when turning the handle to extend umbrella, I heard a snap in the umbrella tube. Umbrella could not be retracted and was stuck mid way up. Needless to say, I was disappointed because it was sorely needed on this sunny, hot July day. Would not recommend this product. :(
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: It was red... Now it's pink.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella at the end of July. I was so happy when I received it. Beautiful bright red easy to assemble. I was very pleased. Unfortunately it is now pink. we liked it so much in the beginning we were going to buy a second one as a backup. I'm glad we didn't. Still holds up fine. Works just fine. But as I said it is pink. My excitement and enthusiasm has faded just like this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Staci B.

customer_reviews.title: Rope to open umbrella did not last long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on April 7th and received on April 14th. Started using on our patio table a few weeks later. At first the umbrella seemed nice and work well but on August 1st the rope that pulls up the umbrella when you open it snapped. We have not put it up and down that much and have made sure to put it down any time it is windy or stormy. It seems like it must have been weak or not put together well for how quickly it broke. We only got about 3 months out of it and for not opening and closing every day that seems like poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Clough

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured wrong cap could not use
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella was either missing a piece or manufactured wrong the cap wound not thread. Unfortunate for me I missed the return date by not assembling when I received umbrella. Poor manufacturing. The umbrella was unusable since I could not return it was trash money thrown away 😐
customer_reviews.author: Jami A

customer_reviews.title: What is the warenty?  I have 3 received November 28 2018  broken
customer_reviews.text: The lift crank up with not work. Is there a replacement or repair that can be done?
customer_reviews.author: H. H. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Do your research before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of the 4 star rating. I ordered the grey one and is expected to arrive tomorrow. After further reading the reviews, I thought I’d better not take my chances. I went to cancel my order and they declined ( it hadn’t even shipped). I really hope the umbrella looks like they have advertised, doesn’t break or turn dingy after a month, or I’m going to sock it to them with a bad review. I have them a 3 star rating because I’m on the fence about this one. To be continued...
customer_reviews.author: Creole Gal 💋

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of comparison shopping online and in stores. This was the best financial deal so I was a bit nervous but it arrived well packaged, easy to snap together and looks just great! I have accidentally left it out in two windy rain storms and it suffered no damage at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Costner

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Some of these patio umbrellas are stupid expensive. I just wanted one for a decent price that gets the job done. This one fit the bill. It slants and everything. You get what you pay for. It is thinner material and the crank isnt the greatest but it works just fine. I recommend it. I see tons of umbrellas that cost 3 times as much. I had one once and it broke the first season.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Morris

customer_reviews.title: not properly assembled
customer_reviews.text: This was falling apart when I received it and the knob couldn't be screwed on the top. The seller wasn't able to help so the whole umbrella had to be taken apart and reassembled. It looks good now, but I could have bought a different one that didn't need a complete rebuild for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: amznrvw

customer_reviews.title: Nice Patio umbrella and a good price
customer_reviews.text: Patio umbrella is bright and cheerful. Painted my cast Iron table and chairs Midnight Blue (Rust-Oleum paint from Amazon). The dark blue table & chairs and the and this bright stripped umbrella make a good combination. Pleasant place to be enjoying the evening after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: GWD

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is perfect for our outdoor patio. The color is exactly as described and tilts to block the sun when needed. It’s a little bigger than I expected which is great. Easy to assemble right out of the bag and was shipped in a box to protect it from breakage or damage. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MJinPalmSprings

customer_reviews.title: great umbrella, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella and has held up well where we live in the country. I like that it has a tilt feature. My only complaint is that there is no strap to wrap around the umbrella when it's down. We put a small bungee cord around it, which works fine.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is ready to go. Just insert half the 1/2 pole into the pole that is attached to the umbrella (which contains the handle to turn the umbrella from down to up and out and also the button to tilt the umbrella) and it's ready to go. Easy turn to open umbrella. I bought the black and white which shows on the outside only. The inside of the umbrella is white but you can see the black stripes through the material. Really well-made and I'm very pleased. As a matter of fact, I'm sitting under it right now as I type this review.
customer_reviews.author: Beanball55

customer_reviews.title: Broken Strut
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella at the end of March but I didn't use it till middle of May. I usually open the umbrella when I'm out by the pool and close it afterwards. It is now June 21st. So its been in use a little over a month. When I opened the umbrella a couple days ago I found that one of the ribs had broken where it meets the stretcher . My umbrellas usually last several seasons (I store them in the garage off season). I've never had a rib break.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Cabat

customer_reviews.title: PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, very pleased with color. Packaging, not so good. Look like someone opened the box and loosely re-taped it (which left it partially open). The box was filthy and the plastic that was wrapped around the umbrella was dirty as well. The umbrella was in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Decent budget umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is not heavyweight, but it looks decent and so far does its job. Disappointed it does not have a tie at the bottom to keep it from flapping around if the wind rises when it is in closed position. We found something to tie it with, so problem solved. Very reasonable price -- about $10-$15 less than comparable patio umbrellas at our local big box store. Good buy if you are looking for a serviceable, neat patio umbrella with no frills at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Lady

customer_reviews.title: Was green now blue. The sun changed its color
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is sturdy. It survived some storms when I probably should have taken it down. I ordered a green umbrella, it was green when it arrived. After a few weeks in the Pittsburgh sun it turned blue. The under side is still green tho.
customer_reviews.author: Bradsdad45

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bright Umbrella!!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this umbrella matches my outdoor decor very well!! The Umbrella colors are beautiful and bright it puts a smile on my face whenever I look at them. When I received the first umbrella I immediately purchased another to beautify my backyard. I purchased the turquoise color too and it put a smile on my face when I pulled it out of the box. Having beautiful colors in one's life makes this crazy horrific time a little brighter!!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS. DO NOT PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on Amazon after reading the many positive reviews. Well... our umbrella SNAPPED AND CAME DOWN ON THE TABLE. While we were sitting at it. To be clear, we were using it under normal conditions, light wind but not enough to disturb our brunch. It was secured in a base filled with concrete. The pole snapped, metal sheared (see photo) plastic parts broke in three directions and could have seriously injured someone in any number of ways. I’m a little horrified to be honest. There is no customer service, no company to contact.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Color way off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in a tan color and it is literally close to baby poop yellow. When the umbrella is open it looks okay but when i first opened the box I thought what a huge mistake. Looks super cheap when the umbrella is down. Would return if it wasn't so heavy. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Have been very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a bit before reviewing to see how it held up. It’s been a few months and it has held up very nicely. It goes up and down easily still. It hasn’t faded at all. And there is no bend in it. If it starts to get windy, we’ll put the umbrella down, but we leave it in the base. Never any problems. About the only thing I would like to see changed is adding a strap to wrap around the umbrella when it’s down.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and have not faded
customer_reviews.text: I have had these umbrella up for about 2 months now. They have not faded. I got the grey color hoping if they did fade, it would not be as noticeable. For the last 2 years, I have ordered from 2 other companies, blue color one year and red color another year. They started fading in no time even though I sprayed them thoroughly with fade resistant spray. So, I can say as of now I am perfectly satisfied. Will add more later if I run into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: dancerlady

customer_reviews.title: It breaks really easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these. It lasted a few days. The seams are so poorly done, that the umbrella didn't even survived being open more than several times. The replacement came in. It lasted a few days. The metal brackets holding the umbrella are really cheaply done. They fractured like twigs without even the winds contributing. Terrible terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Durrell

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Nice garden umbrella. It isn't as heavy-duty as I was expecting but think it will last for several summers. It' really pretty when opened and is a good size to cover not only the table, but several inches OVER the table so chairs get shaded, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Y. Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We use it on a balcony to tone down the afternoon sun. If you're shorter than about 5' 7" it will be hard to reach the tilt mechanism and the crank it a bit harder than our other umbrellas. That said, it's well made and a perfect color.
customer_reviews.author: janh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our deck
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a 42 inch round table and this umbrella is the perfect size. It provides the table and chairs will ample shade. It hasn't rained since we've gotten it so I can't speak to how long it might take to dry out, but I'm still giving it five stars. The crank mechanism is smooth and it's easy to tilt. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Walter

customer_reviews.title: Nice n shady!
customer_reviews.text: Item was packaged well and arrived in perfect shape. The hardware seems very sturdy the umbrella material seems a bit thin so not sure how long it will last. Very simple to assemble and raises and lowers very smooth. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These seem as good as the $125 umbrellas our friends bought at Sam's Club. Overall, well made and a great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: PWY

customer_reviews.title: Like the size
customer_reviews.text: Like the size, but quality very flimsy, it's flopping on the top in the wind. Color way too dark, completely not the color that shown. More charcoal grey not light grey.. I don't think it will live for another season.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia R.

customer_reviews.title: cheap metal
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella broke in 2 weeks . One of the bars extending the umbrella simply broke off when I was opening it. Mechanically the it opened easily, but all the materials are cheap products. That's why the cost is relatively inexpensive. It did resists rain water, ans seemed to block the sun, but i can't recommend anyone but it.
customer_reviews.author: DianaB

product_meta.title: Blissun 9' Outdoor Market Patio Umbrella with Push Button Tilt and Crank, 8 Ribs (Tan)
feature_bullets: 100% POLYESTER FABRIC -- Blissun patio umbrella is made of 100% polyester, waterproof and UV resistant, long lasting, easy to clean.

STURDY ALUMINUM POLE -- Aluminum poles and 8 aluminum ribs for easy and compact storage, in prevention of rust and lighter than the steel pole, easy for operation. With air vented at the top, cool and can withstand sudden gust.
CRANK MECHANISM -- This market umbrella is designed with crank open system for easy and quick use. Push button tilt for more angles of shading, keep the sun at your back.
SUN PROTECTION -- This outdoor umbrella with 9 ft. diameter shade your 42"- 54" round, square or rectangle table with 4 to 6 chairs, Ideal for both residential and commercial locations.

MODERN & WIDELY APPLICABLE -- Blissun 9 feet patio umbrella with elegant design, is a perfect and essential for summer or sunny days to shade sunshine, apply to the yard, beach, square, garden and patio shops like cafe, restaurant, swimming pool.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,392 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
